original: 吳郡吳縣人，陸績之女。十三歲時，與同郡的張白結為夫婦。但婚後僅三個月，張白就被其兄張溫的案件牽連，被處流放，病死他鄉。陸鬱生為其守節，堅不改嫁。
text: Wu County, Wu County, daughter of Lu Ji. At the age of thirteen, he married Zhang Bai in the same county. But only three months after the marriage, Zhang Bai was implicated in the case of his brother Zhang Wen, was sent into exile and died of illness. Lu Yusheng kept the festival for him and refused to remarry.
